subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The Oakland Athletics want to build a new stadium in San Jose, but the Giants insist that San Jose is in their territory, a fact included in Major League Baseball’s constitution in 1990.
snippet: The Oakland Athletics want to build a new stadium in San Jose, but the Giants insist that San Jose is in their territory, a fact included in Major League Baseball’s constitution in 1990.
